content:
LOOK: BBM paid the second tranche of recount fee amounting to approximately 30 million pesos, four days before the payment deadline. (Receipt from Atty. Vic Rodriguez, one of the legal advisers of BBM)

He paid a total of 66 million pesos recount fee.

On the other hand, VP Robredo is expected to pay her remaining balance of 7 million pesos of 15 million pesos total recount fee of the counter-protester's group on or before July 14 (Friday). | via Joy Gumatay

title: BBM paid a total of 66 million pesos for the 2016 VP election recount fee.
